channel.title: How to display certain skulls depending on amount of kills
channel.description:
Since I am not adding Bounty Hunter to my server, I would like to use the bounty hunter skulls to show how many kills a player has had. For instance
The Bronze Skull- Less than 10 kills The Gray Skull- Between 10-50 kills The Green Skull- Between 50-100 kills The Blue Skull- Between 100-500 kills The Red Skull- Above 500 kills
I'm guessing I would have to do something similar to this:?
(Declare public int killskull) [code] if killskull <10 (C:\Documents and Settings\Devon\Desktop\Bluescap3 Client Version 1\Files\Spirts\skull_brown.png)[/code]
